<h1 align="center">
	Hello and thanks for checking me out!
</h1>

<h4 align="center" name="about" class="about">
	Full Stack Software Engineer specializing in scalable, secure, and performant systems. With a background developing high-stakes APIs to facilitate ~$150B in annual money movement (MFA, FRAML, ABAC), I combine deep security expertise with full-stack development. I have a proven track record of driving down operational costs ($200k to $14k annual AWS savings), optimizing database performance, and leading large-scale frontend and backend initiatives. I'm passionate about building elegant, efficient solutions and leveraging data to guide development and strategic decision-making.
</h4>

<p>

```js
const user = {
  name: 'Elijah Samuels',
  passions: ['coding', 'technology', 'music', 'puzzles', 'lego', 'woodworking'],
  about:
    `I try to laugh at the little, day-to-day things. Something like adding the extra 'o' when tyoing array.pop().
     I love getting to learn new skills, whether is a new certification, programming language or something like welding.`,
  pets: [{ name: 'Rosie', animal: 'dog', breed: 'Husky/Aussie mix' }],
  secret: '48697265206d65'
}

convertFromHex = a => {
  let b = ''
  for (let i = 0; i < a.length; i += 2)
    b += String.fromCharCode(parseInt(a.substr(i, 2), 16))
  return b
}
convertFromHex(user.secret)
```

</p>
